headline: Nike’s UK Market Share Pressure And What It May Signal For Investors
summary: Nike (NYSE:NKE) is reported to be losing market share in the UK sportswear market as competition intensifies. Rivals, including Adidas, are cited as gaining share through stronger value perception and trend focused designs. The shift is being linked to consumer views that Nike has been slower to refresh styles and product concepts in the region. Nike is the largest global sportswear brand, with a core business in athletic footwear, apparel, and accessories across performance and lifestyle...
